title: Michael Mørkøv, Coach to Join ‘Cavendish Train’ at Astana-Qazaqstan
content:
The expert leadout man and a top Soudal Quick-Step trainer will give Astana-Qazaqstan extra tools for the 2024 season to chase the 35th record win.

Read the full article at Michael Mørkøv, Coach to Join ‘Cavendish Train’ at Astana-Qazaqstan on Velo.
author: ahood
